txt.en:
'Ah, [placeholder], you return! Let us see the carrots.'

She takes the vegetables from you.

'Yes, these will do nicely. Thank you!'
A Roadside Respite
TBD Nobody should see this?
TBD Nobody should see this either
TBD You don't see this?

'Welcome, traveller. What brings you to the Angle?'

You tell her that you are here at the request of your friend, Elladan, and she smiles at you.

'A friend of Elladan is a friend of mine. Come, join us at the fire. Have you eaten? I am Ivoreth, and my brave guardian is Barhador. We are on an errand to Tham Lumren to trade with the Elves for supplies and stopped here to take a rest and have a bite to eat. Would you join us? It's important to keep your strength up when the land is full of dangers.

'Have you come from the north? I would be thankful for any news from that point of the earth. It is my son Halbarad's duty to safe-guard the north.'

You tell her briefly of your adventures and what news you are able.

'Is that so!? Well, now you must join us for a meal, but I am not sure we have enough to feed another. Go forage up some carrots, would you? They grow wild on a hill to the south, not far from here.'
TBD This also should be overridden?
Collected wild carrots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
TBD
TBD

Ivoreth, the mother of the Ranger Halbarad, travels to Tham Lumren and is stopped along the road for rest and a meal. She has asked you to join them and forage for some wild carrots so that there is enough food for everyone.

Wild carrots grow on a hill to the south of Ivoreth's location in the Angle of Mitheithel. Collect wild carrots to join Ivoreth for a meal.
Return to TBD Boy with the food you collected
Return to Ivoreth with the carrots you collected
You have collected wild carrots to share a meal with Ivoreth. You should return to her at her camp in the Angle of Mitheithel.
